name: Waverun City Tragedy
desc:
In March of 999 in the Radiant Calendar, the Sanctuary Day parade in Waverun City erupted into armed conflict, leaving many civilians dead.
Princess Inanna of Iria, seeking to negotiate with the protesters, tragically lost her life in the chaos.
Soon after, the protesters formed the "Waverun Legion," demanding accountability from Prince Dantalion for the violence and calling for his resignation and trial.
Dantalion dismissed the accusations as treason, rallying his forces to quell the rebellion.
Tensions escalated rapidly as "The Union of Knight States," a powerful military coalition, declared support for the Irian people's resistance against tyranny, sending the Advance Order to secure Waverun City's outskirts.
Meanwhile, the Papal States of Rodinia seized its old capital, Lightgloam City, further complicating the situation.
In this critical moment, a small nation was once again engulfed in the flames of conflict.

editor_name: QV3-P1-18：三王女国葬和伊利亚的反击
name: Princess Inanna's State Funeral and Iria's Strike Back
desc:
It had been a month since the Waverun City incident, and the King's Army's efforts to quell the rebellion are still at a deadlock.
In this period of unrest, Prince Dantalion held a state funeral for the murdered Princess Inanna in the Mornrays Castle.
At the funeral, Dantalion refuted the rumors about the cause of the incident, accusing the Papal States of Rodinia and the Union of Knight States of orchestrating the tragedy. He called on the people to unite and expel the invaders.
The King's Army, whose morale was greatly improved by the state funeral and speech, promptly rejoined the battle.

name: Escalated Battle
desc:
In just a few weeks, war engulfed Iria like wildfire.
The King's Army, the Union, and the Papal States poured troops into the fray.
On every front, relentless skirmishes drove countless civilians into desperation.
In the desperate turmoil, many desperate souls fled to the southeast's Mine Pit.
Seizing the chaos, "Darklight" expanded openly from its hidden base.

name: Spread of Darklight
desc:
As the frontline reached a stalemate, rebellion erupted in the eastern Mine Pit of the Kingdom of Iria.
The notorious "Darklight" declared Mine Pit's complete independence, swiftly expanding its influence.
Refugees, swayed by radical doctrines, joined Darklight's ranks.
After defeating some weak King's Army units, Darklight has emerged as a formidable evil force.
Expanding relentlessly, they ruled with brutality, crushing all resistance mercilessly.
Darklight scouts have lurked on the town's outskirts…

name: Contract
desc:
The Sword of Convallaria allied with the Union.
The Order would establish a camp nearby and protect the town.
The Union aimed to seize Crossroads Keep.
To secure the strategic hub, the Order would fortify a camp near the town as a supply center.
The Sword of Convallaria joined as a key force in the operation…

name: Crossroads Conquest Begins
desc:
After bloody battles, the Order finally completed the isolation of the Crossroads Keep with the help of the Sword of Convallaria…
The Order and the army of the Papal States surrounded the Crossroads Keep from two sides.
It seems that the fate of King's Army is on the edge…

name: War Clouds Gathering
desc:
Despite the Union's initial failure to besiege Crossroads Keep, the beleaguered King's Army was unable to launch a counterattack.
For the past few months, both sides have maintained a stalemate along the line of Crossroads Keep, engaging in minor skirmishes.
The King's Army's failure to continue their victorious pursuit gave the Union the opportunity to regroup.
Meanwhile, voices advocating peace talks with the Union were gradually emerging, further undermining the King's Army's will to fight.
The Union launched a new large-scale offensive, once again targeting Crossroads Keep.
To prevent the Union from quickly defeating the King's Army, the Papal States explicitly stated that they would assist Iria in stopping the Union.

editor_name: QV3-P6-01：第二次十字路口会战决战开幕
name: Beginning of the Final Battle
desc:
The Union once again successfully besieged Crossroads Keep after a tough battle with the Papal States and the King's Army.
This time, the Union showed unprecedented determination, vowing to conquer Crossroads Keep.
On the other hand, seemingly well-prepared, the King's Army significantly enhanced the defense of Crossroads Keep with the help of the Papal States.
Without a doubt, the victor of this final battle will determine the fate of Iria.
Meanwhile, the Sword of Convallaria also took on important offensive tasks…

editor_name: QV3-P6-08：骑士团攻占十字路要塞
name: Union Captures Crossroads Keep
desc:
The cruel second Crossroads Keep campaign finally ended with the victory of the Union.
It also means that the Union has gained unprecedented decisive advantages in this war.
The precarious King's Army abandoned the blockade of the Iria River and retreated to the capital, preparing for a last stand.
However, the influx of refugees only worsened the scarcity of supplies in the Mornrays Castle.
Everyone knows that the situation is irreversible.
Now the King's Army must decide whether to fight or surrender…

name: Final Battle in the Mornrays Castle
desc:
While some people believe that the Union might negotiate peace after their victory, the Order continued to cross the Iria River, advancing toward the Mornrays Castle.
Now, the Kingdom of Iria is left with only two options: surrender and await the Union's judgment, or engage in a defense battle with no chance of winning.
At this time, Lutfi, a longtime loyal ally of the Union, voluntarily applied for the task of attacking the Mornrays Castle head-on.
It seems that this is also part of his plan…

editor_name: QV3-P7-二王子线-05：伊利亚内战结束
name: End of Iria's Internal War
desc:
Iria's capital, Mornrays Castle, surrendered.
The Second Iria War, lasting for over a year, came to an end with the capture of Prince Dantalion.
As the absolute victor of this war, the Union signed a treaty with the interim regent, Prince Lutfi.
But for Lutfi, how will he deal with the Union?
The behemoth looming over Iria…

editor_name: QV3-P7-歌洛莉亚线-02：骑士团的战略
name: Strategy of the Union
desc:
The Union, who have already captured Crossroads Keep, will obviously not be satisfied with the current victory.
After a brief rest, the Order launched an attack on the Mornrays Castle.
The King's Army of Iria built multiple lines of defense, trying to delay the Order's attack.
Guerrilla units were also sent out, in conjunction with the Hanged Men, to disrupt the Order's rear.
A new round of war has once again ignited.

name: Frontline Intel
desc:
Despite the King's Army's best efforts, they were unable to block the Order's advance to the Mornrays Castle in the face of a huge power gap.
Faced with the victory near at hand, the morale of the Order's members is unprecedentedly high. As for the King's Army, their morale is low and supplies are scarce.
The two sides will have their final battle around the Mornrays Castle.
But obviously, there is not much suspense about the outcome of this campaign.

name: Frontline Intel 2
desc:
After paying a heavy price, the Order finally captured the capital, Mornrays Castle.
Plenty of nobles who is on Dantalion's side, pro-war officials, and the Hanged Men members were imprisoned or executed.
The fall of the Mornrays Castle marked the official end of the Iria civil war.
It also means that Auguste can now 
deal with some internal issues within the Advance Order…
